long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Capture and Memorize New Words! 🌟
Want to boost your Japanese, English, or French while immersing yourself in real-world language? The Cardemy Chrome Extension transforms your browsing into a learning experience! 💡 Effortlessly define unfamiliar words or phrases and turn them into interactive video flashcards without interrupting your browsing! Perfect for intermediate to advanced learners looking to expand their vocabulary naturally. 📈✨

🚀 Key Features:
    - Define words you find on any website, also works on YouTube! 📚
    - Save new flashcards directly to your Cardemy app account for easy review 🃏
    - Get context-based definitions with one click [Learn more] 🧠
    - Check word level and pronunciation (furigana included) 🔠

👉 After installing the extension, you will be invited to create a free account on cardemy.com. This is required to use this extension. 

The Cardemy app is the most effective way to master words in a foreign language based on their video contexts, making sure to never forget them thanks to spaced-repetition flashcard quizzes adapted to your level! 

The Cardemy app is available for learning Japanese, English and French as a browser app and mobile apps (iOS & Android). 

Ready to dive in?
